AlertDefinition.name: hdfs_quota
AlertDefinition.label: HDFS QUOTA
AlertDefinition.description: This alert is triggered if quota capacity is reach. It checks the cpacity using WebHDFS. The threshold values are in percent.

parameters.name: quota.warning.threshold
parameters.description: This alert is trigered if space quota is 70% of limit

parameters.name: quota.critical.threshold
parameters.description: This alert is trigered if space quota is 90% of limit
